items.title: Trump plans second coronavirus task force focused on the economy
items.response: President Trump is preparing to launch a second coronavirus task force focused on reviving the U.S. economy, which has been battered by the coronavirus, two administration officials tell Axios.

items.title: WHO official leads criticism of Trump's coronavirus response
items.response: Ezekiel Emanuel, special adviser to the director general of the World Health Organization, told MSNBC Wednesday he found 'most' of what President Trump said at his briefing on the novel coronavirus 'incoherent.'

items.title: White House urges public to avoid gatherings of more than 10 people
items.response: The White House's coronavirus task force announced tougher guidelines on Monday to help slow the spread of the disease, including limiting social gatherings of more than 10 people. .
